name: Thirsty Prom
description:
It's prom night and you don't have a date! That means it's time to get funky and boogie with as many willing dancers as you can before the night is over!

The DJ is mixing up a variety of tunes, but not everyone likes every style! Take note of who's down to dance and who's sitting this one out. Talk to the DJ to shuffle tracks!

All dancers, yourself included, get sweaty and thirsty from all the dancing! Cool off with a drink at the punch bowl and avoid clingy dancers who try to hog all your time!

Watch out for sudden MOSH PITS! Getting moshed doesn't count as dancing, so slip away from the crowd if you can.

The night is young, so get out there and bust a move!

Controls:
- Arrow Keys for Movement
- Space for Interact
- Interact with a dancer to see if they want to dance!
- Interact with the DJ to shuffle the music track!
- Interact with the punch bowl to quench your thirst!
- Escape to return to Main Menu

Objective:
- Dance with as many willing dancers as you can within 5 minutes.

Developers:
- Art: Jillian Stiles (@jauxiles)
- Code: Matt Donatelli (@mattdonatelli)

Music:
- Licensed tracks from MelodyLoops.com
